title: Cookie Policy
intro: This Cookie Policy explains how KEMETRA ("we", "us", or "our") uses cookies and similar tracking technologies when you visit our website. This policy provides information about what cookies are, what types of cookies we use, how we use them, and how you can control your cookie preferences.

whatAreCookies.title: What Are Cookies?
whatAreCookies.p1: Cookies are small text files that are placed on your device (computer, tablet, or mobile phone) when you visit a website. They are widely used to make websites work more efficiently, provide a better user experience, and provide information to website owners.
whatAreCookies.p2: Cookies allow websites to remember your actions and preferences (such as login status, language preference, theme selection, and other display preferences) over a period of time, so you don't have to keep re-entering them whenever you visit the site or browse from one page to another.

essential.title: 1. Essential Cookies (Strictly Necessary)
essential.p1: These cookies are necessary for the website to function properly. They enable core functionality such as security, network management, and accessibility. You cannot opt out of these cookies.
essential.duration: Duration: Session (deleted when browser is closed) or up to 1 year

functional.title: 2. Functional Cookies (Preferences)
functional.p1: These cookies enable enhanced functionality and personalization. They may be set by us or by third-party providers whose services we use on our pages.
items: Store your favorite sites and saved searches
Customize content based on your interests

analytics.title: 3. Analytics and Performance Cookies
analytics.p1: These cookies help us understand how visitors interact with our website by collecting and reporting information anonymously. This helps us improve the website's performance and user experience.
items: Analyze website traffic and usage patterns
Measure website performance and loading times
Understand which pages are most popular

targeting.title: 4. Targeting and Advertising Cookies
targeting.p1: These cookies may be set through our site by our advertising partners. They may be used to build a profile of your interests and show you relevant content on other sites.
items: Limit the number of times you see an ad
targeting.thirdParty: Third-Party Services: Google Ads, Facebook Pixel, Social Media Platforms

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Cookies
thirdParty.p1: In addition to our own cookies, we use various third-party cookies to report usage statistics and deliver advertisements. These include:

google.title: Google Services
items: Google Analytics: Website analytics and performance tracking
Google Maps: Interactive maps and location services

other.title: Other Services
items: Payment Processors: Secure payment processing for purchases

howWeUse.title: How We Use Cookies
howWeUse.p1: We use cookies for various purposes, including:
items: Authentication: To recognize you when you log in and keep you logged in during your session
Personalization: To remember your preferences, such as language, theme, and display settings
Security: To protect your account and detect fraudulent activity
Analytics: To understand how you use our website and improve our services
Functionality: To enable features like saving favorites, search history, and shopping cart
Content Delivery: To optimize content delivery and website performance

management.title: Managing Your Cookie Preferences

browserSettings.title: Browser Settings
browserSettings.p1: Most web browsers allow you to control cookies through their settings. You can set your browser to:
items: Delete cookies when you close your browser
Alert you when a website tries to set a cookie

instructions.title: Browser-Specific Instructions
items: Google Chrome: Settings → Privacy and Security → Cookies and other site data
Firefox: Settings → Privacy & Security → Cookies and Site Data
Safari: Preferences → Privacy → Cookies and website data
Microsoft Edge: Settings → Cookies and site permissions

optOut.title: Opt-Out Tools
optOut.p1: You can also use the following tools to manage advertising cookies:

management.note: Please Note: Blocking or deleting cookies may impact your experience on KEMETRA. Some features may not function properly, and you may need to re-enter your preferences each time you visit.

mobile.title: Cookies on Mobile Devices
mobile.p1: Mobile devices also use cookies and similar technologies. To manage cookies on mobile browsers:
mobile.p2: You can also reset your advertising identifier on mobile devices through your device settings.

dnt.title: Do Not Track Signals
dnt.p1: Some browsers have a "Do Not Track" feature that signals to websites that you do not want your online activities tracked. Currently, there is no universal standard for how to respond to Do Not Track signals. As such, we do not respond to browser Do Not Track signals at this time.

updates.title: Updates to This Cookie Policy
updates.p1: We may update this Cookie Policy from time to time to reflect changes in technology, legislation, our business operations, or for other reasons. We will post the updated policy on this page with a new "Last Updated" date. We encourage you to review this policy periodically.
